name: Versus (itch) (PowR Studios)
description:
To win, you must demolish everything or knock the other player down in this exciting 1v1 video game. This project is now asking for 6000$.

The donations will be accepted only here, so we can keep track on the goal. If we meet the goal in the next 2 months we will give access to the money tracking website. More info below.

What is so special about this project?

That is right, why should you invest in a project that you have never heard of and are not sure if it will ever see the light of day?

Well we have got you beat there! The project has these tasks completed:

  • Core gameplay
  • Different types of bombs
  • Destructible environments
  • FPS Optimization
  • 2 characters
  • Playable demo (Yes you can try the concept out before you decide to kickstart!)
If we have done all those things already why do we need your help?

The truth is, our team is made up entirely of programmers and concept artists. We don't have a 3D designer, therefore you can understand how difficult it is to create a game without one. Since we have made all the core things work we now need money to make the game look appealing to it's players.  We also have NO plans to purchase assets in order to create this game. 

Money you (hopefully) pledge will go towards: 

  • 3D characters
  • 3D animations
  • 3D props
  • 3D blocks 
  • Visual effects
  • Sound effects
What is our primary method of monetization after release:

The game will cost $14.99 on Steam, Xbox One, and PlayStation 5.

As we do not believe in charging for DLC and content updates the following will be released for free:

  • Every new map
  • Every new character
  • Every new bomb type
  • Every new update

5% of all sales will be used to help fund a project the majority of investors decide on, here on itch.io

An original idea for the investors:

Since a slew of scams have surfaced in recent years, and people are fabricating fraudulent products in order to defraud you, we've devised a strategy to address the problem, at least for our project.

We present to you the:

Live funds tracking system.

What does it do?

  • Allows the investors to track every cent that we have received from them.
  • Majority of investors need to agree before we spend money on anything.

With this system we hope that we can earn your trust for this and any other projects.

So you are willing to try out the game demo?

Here you can download the demo and try it out. Keep in mind that the game you are downloading is just a concept and does not represent the final product we intend to release.

If you do not feel comfortable downloading the game you can check out a YouTube video of the gameplay. Just keep in mind that this video is older than the version we currently have cooking.
